comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content:
A3D-2 Skywarrior captured on approach to carrier for arrested landing.
Undercarriage, tail bumper and hook down. Speed brakes out. Partial flap engaged.
Rear gun turret with cannon removed and replaced with 
DECM (Defensive Electronic Countermeasures) within and over ports.
Rearward facing defensive gun radar control dome above.
Code ZB of VAH-4 'Fourrunners' on tail.
Large squadron side number 2 on nose.
Serial number obscured by horizontal stabilator.
